      • addSession

        public static void addSession​(String cinema,
                              String title,
                              String dateTime,
                              String sessionID)
        Creates a new session to be added to the system
        Parameters:
        cinema - The cinema the session would be held in
        title - The movie's title for this session
        dateTime - The planned scheduled time when this session will occur
        sessionID - The unique identifier assigned to this session

      • getHolidays

        public static HashSet<LocalDate> getHolidays()
        Reads from holidays csv file to retrieve the list of holidays. If this file has already been read, the value would be stored in the holidays variable and the file would not be read again.
        Returns:
        a hash set of holiday dates

      • addHolidayToCSV

        public static void addHolidayToCSV​(String date)
        Adds a new holiday Date and saves to file
        Parameters:
        date - The new holiday date to be added
